description:
Provides a NS1 User resource. Creating a user sends an invitation email to the
user's email address. This can be used to create, modify, and delete users.
The credentials used must have the `manage_users` permission set.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AccountManageAccountSettings.description: Whether the user can modify account settings.

AccountManageApikeys.description: Whether the user can modify account apikeys.

AccountManagePaymentMethods.description: Whether the user can modify account payment methods.

AccountManagePlan.description: Whether the user can modify the account plan.

AccountManageTeams.description: Whether the user can modify other teams in the account.

AccountManageUsers.description: Whether the user can modify account users.

AccountViewActivityLog.description: Whether the user can view activity logs.

AccountViewInvoices.description: Whether the user can view invoices.

DataManageDatafeeds.description: Whether the user can modify data feeds.

DataManageDatasources.description: Whether the user can modify data sources.

DataPushToDatafeeds.description: Whether the user can publish to data feeds.

DhcpManageDhcp.description:
Whether the user can manage DHCP.
Only relevant for the DDI product.

DhcpViewDhcp.description:
Whether the user can view DHCP.
Only relevant for the DDI product.

DnsManageZones.description: Whether the user can modify the accounts zones.

DnsViewZones.description: Whether the user can view the accounts zones.

DnsZonesAllow.description: List of zones that the user may access.

DnsZonesAllowByDefault.description: If true, enable the `dns_zones_allow` list, otherwise enable the `dns_zones_deny` list.

DnsZonesDeny.description: List of zones that the user may not access.

Email.description: The email address of the user.

IpWhitelist.description: The IP addresses to whitelist for this key.

IpWhitelistStrict.description: Sets exclusivity on this IP whitelist.

IpamManageIpam.description:
Whether the user can manage IPAM.
Only relevant for the DDI product.

MonitoringManageJobs.description: Whether the user can modify monitoring jobs.

MonitoringManageLists.description: Whether the user can modify notification lists.

MonitoringViewJobs.description: Whether the user can view monitoring jobs.

Name.description: The free form name of the user.

Notify.description: Whether or not to notify the user of specified events. Only `billing` is available currently.

SecurityManageActiveDirectory.description:
Whether the user can manage global active directory.
Only relevant for the DDI product.

SecurityManageGlobal2fa.description: Whether the user can manage global two factor authentication.

Teams.description: The teams that the user belongs to.
